CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Ink jet address / 1 inch Prt Head"), "Ink jet address / 1 inch Prt Head, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Multi-head ink jet / 4 inch Prt Head"), "Multi-head ink jet / 4 inch Prt Head, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Apply indica with ink jet"), "Apply indica with ink jet, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Ink jet message lines"), "Ink jet message lines, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Piece will be glued closed in bindery"), "Piece will be glued closed in bindery, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Tabbing - 1 tab"), "Tabbing - 1 tab, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Tabbing - 2 tabs"), "Tabbing - 2 tabs, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Tabbing - 3 tabs"), "Tabbing - 3 tabs, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"Slim Jim format - 3 tabs x 1.5inch"), "Slim Jim format - 3 tabs x 1.5inch ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES( Mailing_Addressing__c,"White tabs"), "White tabs",NULL)+''
CustomField.label: Mailing Addressing Formatting
